Package org.hibernate.dialect.pagination

Class FetchLimitHandler

java.lang.Object
org.hibernate.dialect.pagination.AbstractLimitHandler
org.hibernate.dialect.pagination.AbstractNoOffsetLimitHandler
org.hibernate.dialect.pagination.FetchLimitHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
LimitHandler
public class FetchLimitHandler extends AbstractNoOffsetLimitHandler
A LimitHandler for databases which support the ANSI SQL standard syntax FETCH FIRST m ROWS ONLY but not OFFSET n ROWS.
